Package de.muspellheim.commons.util

Class About

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.muspellheim.commons.util.About

extends java.lang.Object
    Collect information about an application or a libray.

    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static About of​(java.lang.Class<?> appType)
        Create about information by reading title, version and vendor from a package.

        Use current year as copyright year and a default rights.

        Parameters:
        appType - class from an application or libray for reading package implementation information
        Returns:
        the about information

      • of

public static About of​(java.lang.Class<?> appType,
                       java.lang.String copyrightYear)
        Deprecated.
        use of(Class, int)
        Create about information by reading title, version and vendor from a package.

        Use a default rights.

        Parameters:
        appType - class from an application or libray for reading package implementation information
        copyrightYear - copyright year can not read from a package
        Returns:
        the about information

      • of

        public static About of​(java.lang.String title,
                       Version version,
                       int copyrightYear,
                       java.lang.String copyrightHolder)
        Create about information with specified title, version, copyright holder and copyright year.

        Use a default rights.

        Parameters:
        title - the title
        version - the version
        copyrightYear - the copyright year
        copyrightHolder - the copyright holder
        Returns:
        the about information
